title: Kilter introduces AX-1 precision weeding robot
description:
Kilter AS has launched the AX-1 system, which uses machine learning and autonomous robotics to provide targeted weed control for farmers.

The post Kilter introduces AX-1 precision weeding robot appeared first on The Robot Report.
